content.rendered:
Starring: Carmen Santos, D’Jal, Farida Ouchani, Léticia Belliccini, Pierre Azéma, Sarah Perles, Serge Da Silva, Frédéric Chau, Bruno Sanches

Director: Frank Cimière | Length: 95 Minutes

Genre: Comedy

IMDb: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt10945254/

Release/Country: 2021/France

Opération Portugal (2021) Description: Hakim, 35, a friendly neighborhood cop from Morocco, must infiltrate the Portuguese community for the purpose of an investigation. But can one become Portuguese in three days? Especially when we know that Hakim is a walking disaster at undercover operations. His clumsiness and bad luck turn his many infiltrations into cataclysms. The case is clearly too big for him. Quickly trapped between his feelings and his mission, Hakim, who lives alone with his mother, will discover a community, but also a family.
